a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Learning adjusted years of schooling in girls and boys, 2020
Learning-adjusted years of schooling merge the quantity and quality of education into one metric, accounting
for the fact that similar durations of schooling can yield different learning outcomes.
Data source: World Bank - Women, Business and the Law (2024)
